page.title: 12LEISURE SURVEY IN ILKESTON
page.content:
We conducted a survey among children, aged seven and over, and their parents as to how they spent their leisure time. { {Television}was a firm favourite for adults and children alike. High on the list of children's favourites were{ {listening to music, swimming, keeping {pets, computer games}and{cycling,} including{B.M.X. cycles.}
Men chose{television}as their favourite pastime closely followed by{ {gardening}and a visit to the{local {pub.}Women spent most of their time{ {sewing}or{knitting,}with{television} and{gardening}the other main choices.
